title: IPropertyManagerPageSlider.Style
description: Gets or sets the display properties of a slider control.
returns: Display properties of slider control as defined in swPropMgrPageSliderStyle_e
remarks:
If you do not set the any display properties, then the value is set to 0, which means:
Slider is horizontal.
Slider has not ticks.
Your application is only notified when the user is done dragging the slider to move it.

examples.title: Set Up PropertyManager Page Slider Control (C++)
